title: Jenkins and Jonez - The Future of the NBA Is Now
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - The Future of the NBA Is Now
description:
The guys give an update on The Fish Scandal, discuss Victor Wembanyama vs. Scoot Henderson, ESPN’s new NBA theme song, LeBron bristling at a question about Kareem, Tom Brady’s upcoming divorce, and the latest episode of House of the Dragon. #Volume #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
